soulWeapon.advancement0: Summon the soul of Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle, dealing ??? M.DMG to all enemies and marks Judgement Sigil for 15 sec. Afterward, increases own Crit DMG by 100% for 11 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement1: For the Duration of Skill, reduces Cooldown of self's all Skills by 1 sec every sec.
soulWeapon.advancement2: For the duration of Skill, attacks a random enemy, dealing ??? M.DMG every 1 sec and marking Judgement Sigil for 15 sec. If the target is already marked with a Judgement Sigil, dealing ??? additional M.DMG that ignores DEF.

When the shield effect takes place, consumes all mana, and all skill cooldown is increased by 50%.

dark: At the beginning of each battle, self gains immunity to M.DMG for 5 sec.

background.story: An Angel warrior who descended from the Heavens to punish the Demons and stop the spread of chaos on earth. His delegated tasks include scouting, reconnaissance, and execution of any Demons found on earth. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is quick and decisive against any injustice. He truly loves Mankind and all the life forms that inhabit the earth. This is why he strives to prevent the Demons from defiling this world.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Sherrkyle is a strong weapon of light which is also a treasure of angels, blessed by the archangel. With Arch as its master, it purged Demons and wicked beings that tainted the world.
Arch was a cold vanquisher, and sherrkyle also shared its master's trait.

However, after descending to the world, Arch started to change slowly.
As he watched the humans and lifeforms of the world, Arch slowly began to develop the feeling of love and mercy. Eventually, he recognized the warmth that was blooming inside his heart.

Influenced by his master's change of heart, Sherrkyle also started to change.
From the weapon of a cold, resolute vanquisher to the weapon of the protector of the world.

Finally when Arch made his descent to save lives from danger, Sherrkyle shined ever-bright and awakened in the form of a guardian. Arch's will to protect others has awakened the great guardian.
treasures: A golden arrow created by the divine power of Arch. It summons and materializes the purest and holiest light from heaven, its power increasing according to the amount of divine power given to it. For the good of heart, it's merely a beautiful scene to watch, but if evil creatures are shot by it, they become mutilated and slammed into some non-material dimension.
The symbol of Fire Arbiter Army that fought a fierce battle against Ancient Demons. When using the Magic Square of Pursuit blessed by Lua, the Goddess of Light, Arch becomes a merciless arbiter.

Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg form, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

A heavenly bell that rings in the morning star. The bell rings to warn the Angel warriors whenever the earth faces great trouble, letting them know that divine punishment will be needed. Upon hearing the bell, warriors realize that the time has come for them to slit the throats of the bringers of apocalypse under Lua's name.
